column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We kicked the food party off with two appetizers. She insisted that we try the Spicy Creamy Shrimp Tempura which I was completely open to. The shrimp are a great size and you get a shareable portion. Thanks to the tempura
column2: the shrimp is just lightly battered and fried so it doesn't taste too heavy. The sauce they cover it in is delicious. My friend and I agreed that they could actually serve the tempura and sauce and it alone would be delectable! This is an appetizer I suggest you try.
